availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Floyd County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Cynthia A. May. Father of Adeline L. May, Emily F. May, Elizabeth May, Beverly C. May, Mary A. May, and David May. Farmer in Floyd County in 1860. Sold land to Matthew Pace in Floyd County in 1864.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Floyd County, Unnamed District, p. 15. KYR-0363-001-0001. Find A Grave, "William James May (1819-1883)," Memorial #66577455, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/66577455 (accessed January 1, 2018).
